descriptor.name: Soft Blue Regular Fit Mens Jeans - catalina blue/30
descriptor.short_desc: When you need a reliable pair of jeans that can do it all, reach for these jeans, made with 98% cotton and 2% lycra fabric. The rugged tightly woven twill feels remarkably sturdy yet flexible enough for constant motion. A regular fit skims your body without being too slim or too baggy. Edgy pocket r
descriptor.long_desc: When you need a reliable pair of jeans that can do it all, reach for these jeans, made with 98% cotton and 2% lycra fabric. The rugged tightly woven twill feels remarkably sturdy yet flexible enough for constant motion. A regular fit skims your body without being too slim or too baggy. Edgy pocket rivets and metal stud buttons lend a subtle modern touch. But make no mistake - with their double-reinforced stitching and just-right stretch, you can take these                         denims on any mission from casual evenings to camping mornings. Yes! You have found your new denim buddy.

@ondc/org/statutory_reqs_packaged_commod.common_or_generic_name_of_commodity: Soft Blue Regular Fit Mens Jeans
